dict.acceptation: 计算器；计算者；计算图表；

sent.orig: Studied the calculator network at the hardware aspect, the calculator construction with maintain.
sent.trans: 在硬件方面，学习了计算机网络，计算机组装与维修。

sent.orig: And the valid calculator system installs excellent turn the method seem to be more for key.
sent.trans: 而且有效的计算机系统配置优化方法显得更为关键。

sent.orig: Simulation results show: the design has realized all functions of the electronic calculator.
sent.trans: 仿真结果表明：设计完全实现了电子计算器的全部功能。

sent.orig: The usual practice is to use the data to an electronic calculator in a snap.
sent.trans: 通常的做法是把数据用电子计算器一个一个的摁。

sent.orig: The main business comprises production of calculator, calendar, radio, telephone etc.
sent.trans: 其主要产品包括电子计算器，万年历，收音机，电话机等。
